Query the network to get the value of the summary of beacon chain at a specific time or the last value

```graphql
beaconChainSummary(
  timestamp: Timestamp
): BeaconChainSummary
```


### Arguments

#### [<code style={{ fontWeight: 'normal' }}>beaconChainSummary.<b>timestamp</b></code>](#)<Bullet />[`Timestamp`](/build/api/schema/scalars/timestamp) <Badge class="secondary" text="scalar"/>
> 
> 

### Type

#### [`BeaconChainSummary`](/build/api/schema/objects/beacon-chain-summary) <Badge class="secondary" text="object"/>
> [Beacon Chain Summary] represents the beacon chain aggregate for a certain date
>
